Dilwale (UA)

Movie |

Mafia

  • Release Date: 18 Dec 2015
  • Genre(s): Crime, Action, Comedy
  • Language(s): हिन्दी
  • Director(s): Rohit Shetty
  • Cast(s): Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol , Varun Dhawan, Kriti Sanon, Boman Irani See all Cast & Crew
  • Duration: 2h 38min
  • Music: Jonita Gandhi,Nakash Aziz,Pritam Chakraborty,Benny Dayal,Antara Mitra Songs List
  • Award(s): Film Music 2016 (Won)
    Filmfare 2016 (Nominated) Awards List
  • Similar To: De Dana Dan, An Action Hero
  • Story:
    Raj is a Mafia member. One day he meet a girl (Meera) while chasing by his rival gang and falls in love with her. Later he finds out that this girl is the daughter of the leader of his rival gang. Yet their love story continues until he was shot by his girlfriend upon a deep misunderstanding. After that incident these two lovers lives separate until their siblings fallen in love. With this new love story their paths intertwines again.
    Full Story
5/10

Dilwale - Where to Stream?

Yay! The movie is available for streaming online and you can stream Dilwale movie on Netflix. However, you can also buy the movie Dilwale on YouTube, Google Play, iTunes starting from Rs 150. You can also rent the movie Dilwale on YouTube, iTunes, Google Play starting from Rs 100.

Dilwale - IMAGE GALLERY

STORY AND RATINGS

Story
Raj is a Mafia member. One day he meet a girl (Meera) while chasing by his rival gang and falls in love with her. Later he finds out that this girl is the daughter of the leader of his rival gang. Yet their love story continues until he was shot by his girlfriend upon a deep misunderstanding. After that incident these two lovers lives separate until their siblings fallen in love. With this new love story their paths intertwines again.

TRIVIA AND POPULAR DIALOGUES

Trivia

Shah Rukh Khan and Kajol's 7th movie together excluding cameos.

The song Gerua, picturized on Shah Rukh & Kajol is the most expensive song to be shot in Bollywood. It was shot all the way in Iceland.

Was released along with Sanjay Leela Bhansli's "Bajirao Mastani".

For the first time Shahrukh Khan acted with veteran actor Vinod Khanna.

Vinod Khanna's final on-screen appearance while alive.

Popular Dialogues

"Raj: You are so consistent, Veer!"

"Ishita: Come on Veer, be your name! Raj: Come on Veer, be your name!"
